belongs_to_collection.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street Collection

response.original_title: A Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge
response.overview: Jesse Walsh moves with his family into the home of the lone survivor from a series of attacks by dream-stalking monster, Freddy Krueger. There, he is bedeviled by nightmares and inexplicably violent impulses.
response.tagline: The man of your dreams is back!
response.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge
